code: /* eslint-disable no-debugger */ /* eslint-disable react/prop-types */import{useEffect}from"react";import"./WorkProjectDetail.css";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import ProjectTitle from"../../components/projectTitle/ProjectTitle";import ProjectDetail from"../../components/projectDetail/ProjectDetail";import PreviousNextArrow from"../../components/previousNext/PreviousNext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function WorkProjectDetail(props){var _useParams=useParams(),id=_useParams.id;var portfolio=props.portfolio;var content=portfolio.content;var workArray=content.filter(function(contentItem){return contentItem.type==="project";});var work=workArray&&workArray.length>0&&workArray[0];var projects=work.data.projects;var selectedProjectArray=projects.filter(function(project){return project.id===id;});var selectedProject=selectedProjectArray&&selectedProjectArray.length>0&&selectedProjectArray[0];useEffect(function(){window.scrollTo(0,0);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"projectDetail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PreviousNextArrow,{selectedProject:selectedProject,projects:projects}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectTitle,{project:selectedProject}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectDetail,{details:selectedProject.details})]});}
